text: Dark Candy is the 14th studio album by Chara, which was released on April 13, 2011. Dark Candy was released in two versions: a limited edition CD+DVD version (UMCK-9417) as well as a regular CD Only version (UMCK-1382). This album was Chara's second studio album that wasn't preceded by any singles or promotional tracks, the first being her 2005 effort "something blue". The style of "Dark Candy" is mainly urban with influences from many genres such as electronica, rock, reggae, jazz and ambient. == Track listing == == Japan sales rankings == {|class="wikitable" !Release !Chart !Peak position !First week sales !Sales total |- |rowspan="3"|April 13, 2011 |Oricon Daily Albums Chart |align="center"| | | |- |Oricon Weekly Albums Chart |align="center"|27 |3,666 |5,210 |} == References == http://www.universal- music.co.jp/chara/products/umck-9417/ Category:Chara (singer) albums Category:2011 albums
title: Dark Candy
